title: Walmart to replace AstraZeneca on Nasdaq-100 Index on January 20
summary: Walmart will replace AstraZeneca in the Nasdaq-100 Index on January 20, following its move from the NYSE. Companies often change listings for better alignment with investor bases or to reduce costs.

title: The Aluminium War: Why Ashapura Minechem is dominating the global bauxite shift
summary: Global trade tensions have pushed bauxite into focus. As supply tightens and clean energy demand rises, Ashapura Minechem’s Guinea expansion has driven a sharp stock rally. Can it last?
